revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=CG814WG |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/18/2005 |manuf_country=China |manuf=ASUS |manuf_model=ACM6245 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,cable modem |fcc_id=PY3CG814WGV2, MSQWL120G |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3349 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F640J3C-120 |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=PieceMakers |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=ASUS WL-120g v1 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4306 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325MA2 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=DOCSIS 2.0 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=superuser |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth=00:18:4D,00:1B:2F }} {{TagLine|802.11g Wireless DOCSIS 2.0 Cable Gateway}} :[http://www.netgear.ru/home/products/wirelessrouters/docsis/CG814WG.aspx Product page]
"ACM6245" and "REV: 1.02" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"ASUS WL-120G R1.40" - wireless card.
The FCC manual states there are multiple credentials... *parent / admin: superuser:password *child / non-privlidged: admin:password The default SSID is also stated to be '''Wireless'''.
